column4: hello, what's the problem with empathy ,i can not login in empathy , Authentication failed, "Enter password for default keyring to unlock"  it is locked /usr/bin/empathy   .  what to do ?
Have you changed your Ubuntu password recently?
no
giving password or not , same thing " "Enter password for default keyring to unlock"  it is locked /usr/bin/empathy   .  what to do ?"
The keyring password is usually the same as your login password.
If you cannot remember it, you can delete the keyring.
but it's not working , i am giving the password , that password to install something with sudo aptitude "
how can i delete the keyring ?
Open Accessories -> Passwords and Encryption Keys. Then click the "Passwords" tab. It should list at least one keyring... right-click and delete.
Then restart Empathy.
from the password tab , or other encryption... ?
The program should have four tabs - choose the last one, named "Passwords".
Did you find and delete the keyring?
i deleted the key from the password tab
Now restart Empathy. It should ask for your IM passwords (Yahoo, MSN, others) and store them.
thank you very much
how can i stop displaying offline friends in empathy ?
There should be an option in the menus...I don't have empathy at the moment, so you'll need to find it yourself.
view offline contact > view but it is unchecked , still the offline friends are in display . should i check this ?
Try toggling it... maybe they are online actually :\
i checked the offline contacts , nothing happens
can't login for an yahoo id , network error
